Title: Sexual Tension: Volatile

reviewText: Argentinean writer/directors Marco Berger and Marcelo Monaco present six short films, each one featuring young men in somewhat stereotypical (classic gay-porn dream scenarios) but highly erotic situations. The storylines include a teen boy who feels a sexual rush from a hunky tattoo artist, a young man encountering a friend's sexy cousin, a guy who suggests role-playing with his buddy who is having problems convincing a girl to have sex, a male nurse gives a sensual spongebath to a guy with two broken arms, a man on holiday with his wife finds himself naked in the shower with the innkeeper, and two hunky bodybuilders get touchy-feely with each other following a workout.  Each highly contrived scenario creates a high degree of suspense, as to whether "it" will happen, before the screen fades to black.If you're looking for a plot or great acting, pass this one by.  But if you are in the mood for an erotic buffet of hot, young Latino men, brief full nudity and - as the title suggests - lots of sexual tension, you can't do much better than this. Unrated, but would be a heavy R (No actual sexual acts on screen).  DVD is Spanish with English (or French) subtitles.  I give it three stars out of five.
summary: Very sexy shorts compilation from Argentina
Title: Sexual Tension: Volatile

reviewText: Sexual Tension: Volatile is a very sexy short film compilation containing six hot shorts. And it manages to be very sexy without including any actual sex and doesn't even have so much as a kissing scene between two men. However, it does have lots of nudity (including frontal nudity) and it has lots of sexual tension, hence the title. I have no problem recommending this one to voyeurs and lovers of male nudity.
Title: Sexual Tension: Volatile

Title: Sexual Tension: Volatile

reviewText: This is one of the most sexually charged movies that I have seen in a long time that is built around the emotions and actions of sexual tension and flirtation. This movie has no sex, but it doesn't need it because what makes this movie special is that it thrives on "visual edging"......charging up your sexual motor and bringing you to the edge and keeping you dangling there......My personal favorites in this sexually charged lust fest is (1) The Cousin, (2) The workout partners, and (3) The two friends who talk about sex, and (4) The Tattoo artist......If you like to be visually edged with just the right amount of nudity.....This move is for you...I have watched this movie dozens of times and will probably wear it out and have to buy another......
summary: The Sexual Tension in this Movie will have your motor running for hours........
Title: Sexual Tension: Volatile

reviewText: With so much garbage emnating  on gay USA cinema,one  at least can see some brilliant  Asian  and European gay  movies.This is the latest from Spanish Directors Marcelo Monaco and Marco Berger.If  youe are a fan of ABSENT and PLAN B then you won't want to miss this highly unusual film. They are the most talented gay film makers  in the world today.They have never disappointed  with any of their films.This film comprises several short films about the sexual tensions and frustrations that arise  in people.The  directing,screenplay,photography and  acting are all superb as you would  expect from  such talented filmmakers. If you want  a gay film that is  very different  from anything that you have  seen before,then this film is a must.At only  101 minutes,I wished  it could have gone on longer.The film cries out for a sequel  of more  similar short stories. Ignore the  other people who did not rate this film  very highly as  they are probably unable to comprehend the  film and its ideals. It is truly the best gay film  I have seen in  many years.With  90% of the gay  films today  being  mostly garbage,it is  a treat to be able to see such an unforgettable gay masterpiece.
summary: THE MOST ORIGINAL GAY FILM IN YEARS
Title: Sexual Tension: Volatile

reviewText: The 6 short films with make up this feature are all individually superb. I have viewed it 4 times now and with each viewing I have discovered new and subtle touches which are often humorous and delightful. The acting is excellent in all 6 films and it is well shot in Argentina. It is a wonderful send-up of the unconscious homoerotic element in male relationships. Another masterpiece by Marco Berger who helmed 3 of the films. The remaining 3 films by Marcelo Monico are accomplishments as extraordinary as Sr.Berger's. This is a film not to be missed by anyone who loves genuinely masterful film-making.
summary: An absolutely marvellous film full of sly and subtle humor
Title: Sexual Tension: Volatile
